function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lean construction and value engineering may not address the risk of contagious disease transmission in the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in construction projects.","Mitigation":"Implementing health and safety protocols, regular sanitation, and ventilation in construction sites.","Technologies":"Advanced sanitation systems, air purification technology, and wearable health monitoring devices.","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and site visitors.","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and site supervisors."}]}
